original_title: Chief Incumbent of Hunupitiya Gangaramaya Temple passes away
original_body_lines: The Chief Incumbent of Hunupitiya Gangaramaya Temple in Colombo, Ven. Galaboda Gnanissara Thero, popularly know as “Podi Hamuduruwo”, has passed away, a short while ago
Ven. Galaboda Gnanissara Thero was aged 81 at the time of his passing.
Sources said that Thero was receiving treatment at a private hospital in Colombo.
